channel.title: Sports: Sports News, Scores, Analysis, Schedules & More - The Washington Post
channel.description: The Washington Post Sports section provides sports news, video, scores, analysis and updates about high school, college, and pro sports teams, including the Capitals, Nationals, Redskins, United and Wizards. Post Sports also offers blogs and discussions about the latest sports news.

image.title: Sports: Sports News, Scores, Analysis, Schedules & More - The Washington Post

item.title: Rob Gronkowski’s cat-filled ESPN photo shoot is purr-fect
item.description:
Rob Gronkowski is most definitely a cat person. Or maybe the cats are Gronk felines. Either way, the New England Patriots star and various kittens came together for an ESPN magazine photo shoot that would’ve made several suitable covers for the bygone International Male catalog. In other words, LOOK AT THIS.

Read full article >>
item.dc:creator: Marissa Payne
item.ExtractedText: By Marissa Payne December 10 at 10:48 AM Follow @marissapayne (Joe Robbins/Getty Images) Rob Gronkowski is most definitely a cat person. Or maybe the cats are Gronk felines. Either way, the New England Patriots star and various kittens came together for an ESPN magazine photo shoot that would’ve made several suitable covers for the bygone International Male catalog . In other words, LOOK AT THIS. New @ESPNMag pics of Rob Gronkowski. I'm sensing some serious caption contests coming on… pic.twitter.com/AZCKeEYJ2i — Rachel Nichols (@Rachel__Nichols) December 10, 2014 Not since Kim Kardashian splashed her derriere across the cover of Paper magazine has there been such an attempt to “break the Internet.” But(t) while Kim K.’s photographs courted controversy from various corners of the Internet , the public seems to approve of Gronk’s fur-filled shoot nearly unanimously. After all, you can’t spell catch without a C-A-T. cats. cats. cats. cats. cats, Gronk does adore. pic.twitter.com/KtiCJ0DO0X — Andee Olivares (@o3flasho3) December 10, 2014 LMAO Rob Gronkowski went straight Magic Mike mode with those pictures with them Kittens — ODB IS GOD (@Matt_SuIlivan) December 10, 2014 Shirtless-Gronkowski-With-Kittens dot Tumblr dot com
